definition.name: Alert
definition.description: A reusable alert component that displays important messages or notifications to users. It supports different variants (default and destructive) and can contain titles and descriptions. The component is built using class-variance-authority for style variants management.

variant.description: Controls the visual style of the alert

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the alert

examples:
<Alert>
  <AlertTitle>Heads up!</AlertTitle>
  <AlertDescription>This is a default alert message.</AlertDescription>
</Alert>
definition.visualLayout: A rounded container with optional icon space on the left side. Content is padded and can include a title and description. Different variants affect the background, border, and text colors.

definition.name: AlertTitle
definition.description: A component that renders the title text within an Alert component. It provides appropriate styling for the heading of the alert message with medium font weight and tight tracking.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the title

definition.visualLayout: A heading element (h5) with medium font weight, no bottom margin, and tight letter spacing. Typically appears above the AlertDescription component.

definition.name: AlertDescription
definition.description: A component that renders the description text within an Alert component. It provides appropriate styling for the descriptive content of the alert message.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the description

examples: <AlertDescription>Please check your input and try again.</AlertDescription>
definition.visualLayout: A text container with relaxed line height for better readability. Typically appears below the AlertTitle component.
